title: Dog Whistle for Android Wear
summary: Get the attention of your pet with your Android Wear smartwatch.
developerAddress:
115 Conistone Way,
N7 9DE
London
United Kingdom
description: You NEED this app if you own a dog. Having dog whistle on your smartwatch is super cool and will help you to take control and to teach your pet a new tricks.★ Get the attention of your pet with your smartwatch.★ Whistles with different frequency.You can set your own one.★ Simple and joy to use.★ It works on cats to.Supports all Android Wear Smartwatches.You can read more about http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog_whistle
descriptionHTML:
You NEED this app if you own a dog. Having dog whistle on your smartwatch is super cool and will help you to take control and to teach your pet a new tricks.

★ Get the attention of your pet with your smartwatch.
★ Whistles with different frequency.You can set your own one.
★ Simple and joy to use.
★ It works on cats to.

Supports all Android Wear Smartwatches.

You can read more about http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog_whistle
comments: Seems to work OK on my Nexus 5. At first I thought is wasn't, but I went to a site that lets one run their own hearing test. Seems I've lost more than I realized off the top.
Rubbish Don't do anything when pressing the start button
